tool.name: minfi Get M
tool.description: returns the Fisher information corresponding to a model and a design

configfiles.configfile:
require("minfi", quietly = TRUE) MSet <- get(load('$mset'))
m <- getM(MSet)
write.table(m, '$matrix')

param.name: mset
param.label: MethylSet
param.help: This class holds preprocessed data for Illumina methylation microarrays, mapped to a genomic location.

tool.help: This tool output M value the logit representation of methylation level ratio based on intensities between methylated and unmethylated alleles in each probed CpG site.
